hero.headline: Discover Project
hero.subheadline: Empower your team, simplify complexities, and achieve exceptional outcomes using our user-friendly project management platform.

features.analytics_desc: Gain actionable insights and track project performance with our advanced statistics and analytics tools.

detailed_features.title: Streamline your workflow from start to finish
detailed_features.subtitle: Timagatt handles the complexity so you can focus on the creativity. Build faster, ship sooner.

instant_updates.title: Instant Updates
instant_updates.desc: Changes propagate in real-time across your entire workspace. No more refresh buttons.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.desc: Bank-grade encryption and SSO support ensuring your data remains private and secure.

collaborative.title: Collaborative by Default
collaborative.desc: Comment, tag, and assign tasks seamlessly. Keep everyone in the loop effortlessly.
